answers.answer: I was a week over, they estimated 9lbs and he came out 7.
With my first baby i was 9 days over. I had to be induced and my cervix was completely closed too!  Even with gestational diabetes and being over due my little girl was 7lb 7oz.
I had overdue babies. 41+ weeks and 42+ weeks. First was 5 pounds, second was 7 pounds.

question: I'm now 3 days overdue and I had a sweep on Tues 13th Jan. The midwife said my cervix was closed then. I'm booked in for a second sweep next Tues if I'm still pregnant.I just wondered if u can have an average baby weight if u are overdue? Or are u more likely to have an 8 pounder and above?This is my first so I was prepared to be possibly overdue
title: Overdue and cervix closed
